__e: She was a bit, she said it will all go wrong and I will come running back to her but she's wrong, it won't, will it, Dad?
I know, but it wasn't right.
I guess she was wrong, wasn't she?
I guess she was wrong, wasn't she?
I did not do the wrong thing. That's not what I said.
I know, but it wasn't right.
How could you possibly know that you're the wrong girl for him?
That's the part you have a problem with?
Who is that? All you need to know is she's the wrong girl for you.
I was wrong and you were right.
Who are you to say that she is wrong and you are right?
I have seen the error of my ways, and you're not the girl I said you were. So...
You're wrong and it is my job to say no to you.
Because someone has to tell her she's in the wrong, and better you than me. That's great.
- I just... I did a bad thing, and I don't know what to do about it.
Look, I think you're getting the wrong idea about me as a man.
That's how she knows how wrong she is about me.
And she was wrong about me, and... I was wrong about you.
Maybe you're wrong about what's best for this family too. What family?
She's wrong, what she said about you.
Okay, you are... not wrong about what you said in there.
(DOOR CLOSING) You told me I was wrong about you.
Are you sure you're not making another mistake?
And she was wrong about me, and... I was wrong about you.
There's something really wrong with your brother.
Wait. Wait, wait, wait. You're saying there's something wrong with the baby's heart?
Yeah,there's something wrong with my dad.
Mm. (Chuckles) Is there... is there something wrong with your mouth?
See there's something very wrong with your city when the only good thing - you have going for it is the weather.
The only thing wrong with this picture is that I'm not with you.
There's certainly something wrong with him... even though he said this morning that there wasn't.
Why does something have to be wrong with her?
- Yes. There's something odd about that man and I can't quite pinpoint it.
I know this is probably the wrong time but.. ..I like you and I want you to stay.
You know something went wrong but you don't know what.
- No, he wasn't. You're wrong, but that's my business.
